title: How to Draw a Caterpillar for Beginners

steps.title: Start by making 4 M's.
steps.content: Start by making 4 M's. Connect them all so that there is no space in between the letters.(The M's have to be round! Not pointy.)

steps.title: Draw a connecting circle after the last M.
steps.content: Draw a connecting circle after the last M.

steps.title: Start with the end of the circle and go back the same way you came.
steps.content: Start with the end of the circle and go back the same way you came. Make M's with the center of each of the M's going between each 'u' of the M. (Just like the Me-To We symbol!) Make a connecting tail that goes up into a triangle. Connect the bottom and top M's.

steps.title: Draw 2 lines that come from the top of the head.
steps.content: Draw 2 lines that come from the top of the head. Make two tiny circles on each end for antennas.

steps.title: Draw a small circle for an eye.
steps.content: Draw a small circle for an eye.

steps.title: Draw a small upwards triangle for a smile.
steps.content: Draw a small upwards triangle for a smile .
